project.name: C-C806B-GIMP-10-ST02-DT06-DF10-CF02-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a filename to read in the file contents using an fread operation within the function Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C806B-GIMP-10-ST02-DT06-DF10-CF02-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved jpg file Has a buffer declared on the heap. malloc(64*sizeOf(char)) If input is shorter than 64 it will overflowdue to using improper sizeof and strlen checking
